text:
Is it bad that I enjoy and  
prefer downloading free books  
in the internet than using  
the paper books? Other prefer  
reading from paper books but  
find e-books easier & easier  
any time and anywhere. There  
are so many sites where you  
can download for free. There  
is Vk mobile site, epaibub  
and other that offer wide  
selection of genre of book.
